video_prompt: Waves gently break on the shore, foam receding. Clouds drift lazily across the sky, light playing across their surfaces. Palm fronds sway softly in the breeze, casting shifting shadows on the sand. Reflections shimmer and ripple on the water's surface as sun glances off the clear shallows.
image_prompt: Tropical beach with a tiki hut, palm tree, white sand, and turquoise ocean under a bright blue sky with fluffy white clouds. Vertical format.
refined_video_prompt: Waves incessantly break and recede along the shoreline. Clouds slowly drift across the sky, their forms and illuminated surfaces subtly transforming. Palm fronds gently sway, projecting dynamic, shifting shadows onto the sand. Sunlight continually glints and ripples across the water, causing reflections to shimmer and move in the clear shallows.
